name: CITY OF WICHITA, KANSAS
sampleDescriptions: Seeking an extension of Amtrak into Wichita.
FY2018 and 2019 Transportation and Housing and Urban Development Appropriations Bill funding for surface transportation, the Community Development Block Grant program and housing programs; FY2018 and
Federal Aviation Administration reauthorization, with no privatization of Air Traffic Control. Continuation of control tower weather observers at Wichita Dwight D. Eisenhower National Airport.
Promotion of Wichita's Ozone Advance Program policies.
